Name: Asian King
Review Text: My favourite sushi place! My family and I order from here every Friday. The same team as always and delicious sushi for affordable prices. If you live in Amsterdam West, go order from them! Personal favourite: salmon handroll and Taiwanese dumplings

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Poor quality. The fish wasn't spoiled, but it was far from fresh.

Name: Asian King
Review Text: I ordered the sushi combi 2, it was perfect. Everything fresh and delicious. The service was fast, I‚Äôm a fan üíì

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Not only is the sushi delicious enough to be comparable to that in Tokyo, but the service is above and beyond what you normally find here Amsterdam. This is our go to spot to get our sushi fix and we highly recommend it.

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Big portions, reasonable prices, and tasty. Fast and friendly service.

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Not good. Waited for an hour for my delivery just to be cancelled without any explanation.

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Really fresh and tasty sushi. Friendly staff.

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Love everything especially the salmon menu. The seaweed salad is also delicious but the portion is small. Sushi are fresh every time , delivery is fast. Great jobs guys!

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Went here for take away not expecting too much. Friendly staff, amazing quality, big portions.

Name: Asian King
Review Text:
Delicious sushi, also enough options for vegetarians.
The chef has 18 years of experience and was a sushi chef in japan as well.

Name: Asian King
Review Text: I definitely recommend this place! I order here all the time, the price is reasonable, super friendly workers and the food is ready in time! This is so far the best take-away in Amsterdam! :)

Name: Asian King
Review Text:

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Cannot read order instructions. Ordered 3 times. Received half my order 3 times. Sushi is okay for price but standards are low at this price point so not an achievement.

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Very tasty and fresh!

Name: Asian King
Review Text: Very fresh and tasty sushi for a good price. Would definitely recommend this place.
